Entries.Tue: It's nice staying in the jungle when the sun gets really bright.#$e#We can hide out here, and nothing will find us... I like it.$h
Miss Penny taught me everything I know about the modern world. She's always been really nice to me...
Entries.Wed: Between Linus and Miss Penny, I've learned everything there is to learn. I'm very grateful for their help.#$e#Mayor Lewis told me he's proud to have me living here... it feels nice to be appreciated.$h
Entries.Fri8: It was difficult getting used to cooked fish at first, but now I have a serious craving for shrimp scampi.
Entries.Sat: Maybe some day, I'll visit Zuzu City...$u#$b#I think... someday I'll get the courage to do it!$h
Entries.Sat10_inlaw_Jas: I saw Jas the other day, walking through town. She's always been a very radiant person, but she looks even happier ever since she got married.$h
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-8: ...Ah... I'm sorry, @, I really don't have any use for this.$s
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-22: For fishing? Why would you need this to fish...?$s
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-24: Ah... I prefer to make my own furniture, @.$s
